abstract: Two groups supporting Hillary Clinton’s presidency have teamed up for their first paid attack ad against Donald J. Trump, seizing on comments he made that women who receive abortions should receive “some form of punishment” were the procedure to be banned in the United States.

headline.main: Pro-Hillary Clinton Groups Plan First Ad Against Donald Trump

snippet: Two groups supporting Hillary Clinton’s presidency have teamed up for their first paid attack ad against Donald J. Trump, seizing on comments he made that women who receive abortions should receive “some form of punishment” were the procedure to be banned in the United States.
